tool_description: Given a set of letters, generate all the words that can be produced by adding at least one additional letter, arranged hierarchically.
title: Word Tree

api_list.name: CSW21
api_list.description: Search for words using Collins Scrabble Words 2021 lexicon.

required_parameters.name: input
required_parameters.description: A series of at least 4 letters (a-z, case-insensitive). No other characters should be included or no meaningful results will be returned.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-tree.p.rapidapi.com/CSW21/{input}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-tree.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: NWL20
api_list.description: Search using the NASPA Word List 2020 edition, Â© 2020 North American Word Game Players Association.
